sen.j: 尾上 辰之助（おのえ たつのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Tatsunosuke ONOE is a kabuki actor.
Tatsunosuke ONOE is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Tatsunosuke ONOE is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
His Yago (stage family name) is Otowaya.
sen.cmt: 「屋号」の訳語は、以下のサイトを参考にしました。http://www2.ntj.jac.go.jp/unesco/kabuki/en/4/4_03_01.html
sen.e: The stage family name is Otowaya.
The stage family name is Otowaya.

sen.j: 定紋は四ツ輪に抱き柏。
sen.e: His Jomon (family crest) is yotsu-wa ni daki-gashiwa (the oak leaves on four rings).
The Jomon (family crest) is Yotsu-wa ni Daki-gashiwa (four rings with a pair of Japanese emperor leaves).
sen.cmt: 表現を合わせ、用語集に合わせました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Yotsu-wa ni Daki-gashiwa (four rings with a pair of Japanese emperor leaves).

tit.j: 尾上辰之助 (初代) - 尾上松緑 (2代目)の長男。
tit.e: Tatsunosuke ONOE Ⅰ- the first son of Shoroku ONOE Ⅱ.
Tatsunosuke ONOE (the first): The oldest son of Shoroku ONOE (the second).
Tatsunosuke ONOE (the first): The oldest son of Shoroku ONOE (the second).

sen.e: The oldest son of Shoroku ONOE (the second).
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ。前文と重複しています。英訳補足しました。
sen.e: The oldest son of Shoroku ONOE (the second).

sen.j: 没後、尾上松緑 (3代目)を追贈。
sen.e: After his death, he was inducted posthumously into Shoroku ONOE Ⅲ.
After his death, he was conferring the name of Shoroku ONOE (the third) posthumously.
After his death, he was conferred the name of Shoroku ONOE (the third) posthumously.

tit.j: 尾上辰之助 (2代目) - 初代の長男。
tit.e: Shoroku ONOE Ⅳ - the first son of Tatsunosuke ONOE Ⅰ.
tit.cmt: 「初代」は「尾上辰之助 (初代)」と解釈して訳しました。
tit.e: Tatsunosuke ONOE (the second): The oldest son of the first.
tit.cmt: 原文には 「尾上松緑 (4代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「尾上辰之助 (2代目)」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。
tit.e: Tatsunosuke ONOE (the second): The oldest son of the first.

sen.e: The oldest son of the first.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ。前文と重複しています。英訳補足しました。
sen.e: The oldest son of the first.
He is present Shoroku ONOE Ⅳ.
He is present Shoroku ONOE (the fourth).
He is present Shoroku ONOE (the fourth).
